name: Play Ball (XM9G)
description:
Welcome to Play Ball!

Unique features:

  • Replay mode.
  • Custom modes.

Custom modes list:

  1.  Normal - the normal game.
  2.  Dream - for cheaters, the game will play it for you.
  3.  Opposite - the game is inverted.
  4.  Original Pong - similar to the original game Pong.
  5.  Impossible - it's hard.
  6.  Mouse Following: the paddle follows the mouse

Credits:

  • Pen Text Engine++
